Release.DisplayTitleText: The Italian - Live In Concert (Concert Film)
Release.Synopsis: Patrizio Buanne: Live in concert, August 2005. A stunning live performance of his debut album 'The Italian' filmed in a beautiful Roman amphitheatre. Watch Patrizio at his best as the sun sets and night falls through the arches of this ancient arena - the perfect setting for an evening with 'The Italian'... Viva la dolce vita!
